summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: India Crafts ™ 4 Packs - 1 mm-80 Silver Dots Diamond Crystal Bindi/Fake Nose Stud
Review Date: 2018/08/27
Store: India Crafts
Product Description: ['* The bindi is arguably the most visually fascinating of all forms of body decoration. Bindi attach great importance to this ornamental mark on the forehead between the two eyebrows.', 'This Listing if for', ':-  4 Packs of Diamond Crystals Bindis.* Dots with Sparkling Crystals which gives you a wide variety to choose your Bindis as per Occasions with your Costume. Perfect accessory for Forehead, Face, Nails, Belly Button, Body, Art Crafts Project work, Cell phones, Bags etc. Our Bindi are Self Adhesive,ready to use and reusable.All BINDIS are Delicate so need to use carefully insertion & out to prevent any damage, fell apart ,damage.', 'PRODUCT AUTHENCITY:', "We send you all bindi packs safely in India Crafts Packaging as shown in pic. .If you don't receive Bindi Packs as shown in pic with our packaging, you can return item and report to Amazon. We make you sure that all our Designer Bindis are made to get compliments from your love once, definitely you will satisfied and like Collection so buy with confidence .But in any case if our creation doesn’t meet upto your expectations for Any Reason, with in Amazon FBA Time Frame You Can Return it as it is as You Received & we will give you Full Refund .*", 'HOW TO USE:', 'All gems are applied just like a sticker and can be used a few times, once the glue has dried out they can be', 're-used using eyelash glue.', "✮ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: If, for whatever reason, you don't absolutely love your order, simply return it, and we'll refund every penny (or send a replacement, if there is a problem).", '✮ QUICK DELIVERY:', 'Amazon prime will deliver your beauty products to you as soon as possible for your parties, festivals and holidays.']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.51 x 3.39 x 0.71 inches; 0.56 Ounces', 'Department': 'Womens', 'UPC': '688039336644', 'Manufacturer': 'Sheesham IVY LLP'}
Review Text: After reading all the reviews, I knew there might be a sticking issue. So, in preparation I also ordered clear eyelash glue. I think that did the trick. I didn't have an issue getting them off the paper as some people mentioned - just be careful knowing they're small & delicate. I used a tweezer. It's fun to have a temporary nose stud! Now trying to figure out exactly where to place it was the challenge for me.
Review Title: Temporary Fashion Statement
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Elfina Hair Cutting Shears, 6.0" Professional Stainless Barber Scissors Set for Hairdressing, Thinning, Texturizing, Salon or Home Use - Flat Shears, Tooth Shears, Comb & Hair Clip Included (Pink)
Review Date: 2018/10/08
Store: ELFINA
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ELFINA', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 3.5 x 1 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BE-HS-GPINK', 'Manufacturer': 'ELFINA'}
Review Text: Scissors work great. That's all I needed though. I don't have any use for the thinner. I would've preferred a cape instead.
Review Title: Good scissors
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce
Review Date: 2020/04/18
Store: Bioré
Product Description: ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'}
Review Text: The first thing I noticed when I used the product was the delicate scent. It's very nice and stays on you for awhile. So, you pump out the 'gel' which I would call soap except for the fact that it doesn't lather much. Instructions say to pump in your hand then apply to face. I tried that, but my face felt too dry, so I moistened it a little bit and then applied the gel. I rinsed it off well and patted my skin dry. Within seconds I felt my skin drying up. If you have really dry skin, you know what I mean - that taut feeling you try to avoid. I had to get some cream and moisturize right away. I'm guessing there must be something like alcohol in this makeup remover. If you have oily skin or perhaps you're trying to remove a heavy foundation - this may be a good choice for you. But since I wear light makeup and have very dry skin, I can't use this. I'll try it again in the summer when my skin produces more oil as the scent is really nice and makes it worth a second try.
Review Title: Not for dry skin
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sia Botanics Vitamin C + Lemon Peel Brightening Cleanser Concentrate (4 oz)
Review Date: 2021/04/24
Store: Sia Botanics
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Sia Botanics', 'Scent': 'Lemon', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '4.13 x 1.93 x 1.93 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '713757593908'}
Review Text: I just washed my face with this Sia C + Lemon Peel wash. It lathered nicely in my hands and on my face. It has a soft lemony scent. It rinsed well - and this is where you'll feel the difference. You know the phrase 'squeaky clean'? That's what you'll feel. There's absolutely no residue left behind. If you've used Noxema to wash your face, it has a similar effect. Because I'm prone to dry skin, I had to apply cream immediately. The label on the bottle suggests washing with this, then using a toner, followed by Vitamin C. Makes sense as your skin is stripped of everything and is ready for some TLC. I think this is an ideal wash for people with oily or combination skin. For me, this will be a great summer wash to control the shine (oil). If you're skin is dry like mine, then moisturize immediately after using.
Review Title: Lemony face wash 🍋
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AJOKE 10 pcs Soft Makeup Sponge set Blender,Flawless Beauty Sponge Blenders for Dry & Wet Use,for Cream,Powder and Liquid,Multi-colored Makeup Sponges
Review Date: 2021/12/26
Store: AJOKE
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AJOKE', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Sponge,Foam', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup Sponge', 'Specific Uses For Product': 'Blender', 'Package Dimensions': '7.95 x 5.12 x 1.73 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
Review Text: I don't often wear cover-up but when I do, a good sponge can really help with the application. The sponge can get into the crevices better than your fingertip can and is much gentler to use around your delicate eye area. I've found cleaning them is somewhat of a chore, but you need to keep them clean. I rinsed mine thoroughly and let it air-dry. This 10-pack is a good value and will last awhile.
Review Title: For makeup
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wenobby 2 PCS 3.2" Retro Rhinestone Organic Cellulose Acetate Hair Claw Clip for Women
Review Date: 2022/04/11
Store: Wenobby
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Wenobby', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Rhinestone', 'Material': 'Wood, Plastic, Cotton', 'UPC': '797823973405'}
Review Text: These look just as nice in person. These will be my 'special occasion' clips from weddings to funerals. I have long straight hair and these clips hold my hair back with no problem. Easy to open, comfortable to wear. The black can be for evening events and the cream color for daytime. There's just the right amount of sparkle. They're really nice and I would gladly recommend them.
Review Title: Fancy clips
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has had several positive experiences with their purchases, notably appreciating the aesthetic and functionality of various accessories and beauty products. Items like temporary body decorations and stylish hair clips were highlighted for their visual appeal and usability. Users experienced satisfaction with the performance of makeup sponges and hair cutting shears, emphasizing their effectiveness in application and cutting. A gentle scent and effective cleansing properties were also praised in skincare products, adding to their attractiveness. The overall sentiment reflects a strong enjoyment of products that enhance one’s look and provide practical solutions.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite overall positive interactions, the user encountered some drawbacks with certain purchases. Specific products were found unsuitable for dry skin, leading to discomfort immediately after use. There were also concerns regarding the usability and effectiveness of delicate body decorations, indicating potential issues with adherence. A lack of satisfaction was noted with certain tools that didn’t meet all the user’s needs, as they preferred alternatives that would better serve their purposes. These experiences highlight the need for caution regarding skin compatibility and personal preferences.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user’s shopping history reveals a balance of positive and negative experiences. They expressed delight in various beauty accessories that offered aesthetic appeal and functionality, as well as satisfactory performance from hair cutting tools and sponges. However, issues arose with skin compatibility in certain cleansing products, alongside challenges related to delicate items not meeting expectations. These mixed experiences outline the importance of considering both personal skin type and intended product use when making beauty purchases, ultimately leading to a more satisfactory shopping experience.

target_interaction.title: It's nice, but...
target_interaction.text: Very nice color. It's somewhere in the bronze family. It works with both pale and tanned skin. The lipstick feels a little gritty on my lips from the glitter. The case is cool although I'm not sure why the cover is magnetic - so I don't lose it? It's a very nice color, but I'm just not comfortable with the luxury price tag on this one.
target_interaction.title_meta: EMILIE HEATHE - Lip Atelier Lip Color | Sustainable, Cruelty-Free, Clean Beauty (Public)

videos.title: Emilie Heathe Lip Atelier Lip Color
